title: Integration & MVP Launch
notes: Cross-service integration tests (core domain: conflict detection, overpayment alert, cancel-reactivate, alert side effects), dashboard BFF auth-to-CRUD journey test, RBAC matrix test (6 endpoints × 3 roles), WA BFF pipeline integration test (webhook → idempotency → dedup → rate limit), seed data --verify flag, GitHub Actions CI (typecheck → test → build), smoke test script. 279 total tests passing (up from 184).
